name: boinc.be clean style
description:
A cleaner forum style for the boinc.be forums.
FIRST CHOOSE FOR THE DEFAULT VBULLETIN FORUM SKIN!!!
As this is a variant of the default vbulletin theme you can edit the code to use it on any default vbulletin skinned forum.
----------
Boinc is the berkeley open infrastructure for network computing.
Help science and contribute your unused computer resources, afterwards join the boinc.be team ;) 
The team for Belgians and their friends, who love the smell of red glowing cpu's in the morning
